title: Difference between Hasan & Sahih Hadith? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Pakistan Sheikh my question
is that if Hasan hadith is .............. what? is Hasan hadith called .......... I do not
understand what the question is Hasan hadith and Sahih hadith they are grades of classification
of the hadith and both of them they refer to authentic hadith where sahih is stronger
than Hasan but both are authentic and accepted and its a technical terminology that is used
and Allah Azza Wa Jal knows best
